entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
